about: Hi! I'm Kaushik. I love solving problems I encounter using whatever tools I have. I am an undergrad in Information Technology. I find it interesting to apply AI in various situations to see what it accomplishes. I enjoy researching AI and have made a few contributions to this vast field. I am currently researching eXplainable AI for everyone. My other interests include Full Stack Development, and I have completed a few projects in this area.
about2: My passion for tech led me to co-found {company}, the world's first multi-agent AGI engine. The aim of {company} is to promote the widespread use of AI in diverse fields. Additionally, I co-founded LegalAppa, an AI-powered platform simplifying legal document preparation for everyone. LegalAppa includes a live AI assistant tailored for advocates from the High Court of Madras, Madurai. Thatâ€™s a brief introduction about me. Feel free to explore my projects and publications!
